name: Roll'n'Jump (WIP)
description:
Hello and welcome to Roll'n'Jump.

Roll'n'Jump is based on my Avoid The Obstacles game but with a new concept and now with jumping, it is currently in demo state as i seek some ideas for the levels, hopefully it can evolve into something better, please try it out and tell me below how it was (Negative and Positive) and/or contribute some of you´re ideas! :)

For every platformed colour you complete there will be a checkpoint, if you fall out of the map then you will be spawned back to that checkpoint.

Genre: 3D Platformer

Gameplay: Single Player 

Type: Third person/ball view

Platform: PC 

Status: DEMO v0.1

Game Difficulty: Easy / Normal

CONTROLS

Keyboard:

  • Movement – WASD
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • Pause Menu - ESC

TO-DO-LIST

  1. More Levels.
  2. Add Music
  3. Add Better End Screen
